entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to a few rain showers and flurries near noon and ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023
